sentences.sContent: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.sCn: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.sContent: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.sCn: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

trans.tranOther: the second largest continent; located south of Europe and bordered to the west by the South Atlantic and to the east by the Indian Ocean
